about_the_game:
A modern, indie, interpretation on the well established genre of city builders; meet Uber Urban. With genre-defining mechanics as well as more innovative strategy elements, Uber Urban enables players to build the city of their dreams like never before.


Enjoy building your city with a large, ever expanding catalogue of buildings; manage your finances through taxation and demand and build a truly thriving metropolis with hundreds of thousands of inhabitants. Be careful though, as your management and construction decisions will affect the growth and success of your city.


Every action you make, no matter how big or small, will impact your approval rating. Sign or revoke policies, by-laws, and subsidies, just as a real mayor would. Find the fine line between profits and happiness, but remember to have a majority approval rating when election time comes.


Get to know the people of your city on a more personal level, and learn what they want from you. Be sure to fulfill promises on time in order to get a reward and stay in good standing with your community.


Experience many more gameplay features like loans, budgeting, nature, mixed use buildings, achievements, city stats, services, demand and more!

Community Involvement

I will be actively looking to the community while the game is in early access to see where the community wants the game to go. If you want to make a suggestion, please write a comment on the pinned feature request discussion in the games steam community page.
detailed_description:
A modern, indie, interpretation on the well established genre of city builders; meet Uber Urban. With genre-defining mechanics as well as more innovative strategy elements, Uber Urban enables players to build the city of their dreams like never before.


Enjoy building your city with a large, ever expanding catalogue of buildings; manage your finances through taxation and demand and build a truly thriving metropolis with hundreds of thousands of inhabitants. Be careful though, as your management and construction decisions will affect the growth and success of your city.


Every action you make, no matter how big or small, will impact your approval rating. Sign or revoke policies, by-laws, and subsidies, just as a real mayor would. Find the fine line between profits and happiness, but remember to have a majority approval rating when election time comes.


Get to know the people of your city on a more personal level, and learn what they want from you. Be sure to fulfill promises on time in order to get a reward and stay in good standing with your community.


Experience many more gameplay features like loans, budgeting, nature, mixed use buildings, achievements, city stats, services, demand and more!

Community Involvement

I will be actively looking to the community while the game is in early access to see where the community wants the game to go. If you want to make a suggestion, please write a comment on the pinned feature request discussion in the games steam community page.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Ventura Or Higher
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 Core GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requires Apple Silicone.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura Or Higher
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 10 Core GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requires Apple Silicone.

name: Uber Urban

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: Build your city in a procedurally generated world and manage all the complexities that a real mayor would. From city services to demand, finances, policies, approval ratings and re-election, Uber Urban offers a complete and innovative take on the city building genre.
